title: Create a cron job with image busybox that runs on a schedule of "*/1 * * * *" and writes 'date; echo Hello from the Kubernetes cluster' to standard output
description: Create a cron job with image busybox that runs on a schedule of "*/1 * * * *" and writes 'date; echo Hello from the Kubernetes cluster' to standard output

steps: 1. kubectl create cronjob busybox --image=busybox --schedule="*/1 * * * *" -- /bin/sh -c 'date; echo Hello from the Kubernetes cluster'
